import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Form, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import Message from '../components/Message' import { addToCart } from '../actions/cartActions' import { useParams } from 'react-router' const CartScreen = ({ location, match, history }) => { const productId = match.params.id const qty = location.search console.log(qty) return
CartScreen
} export default CartScreen
